TEXT.TITLE: POWER CORP DETAILS PREFERRED SHARE SUBSCRIPTION
TEXT.BODY: (Power Corp of Canada) said it received subscriptions for 252,223 shares of its recent issue of participating preferred shares for total proceeds of 4.3 mln dlrs. Reuter
